entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:12 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -32.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Akulivik Airport 08:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 30. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of light snow this morning. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 50 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 33.
